INPUT(Open QMS on the correct station and press ENTER to continue)
INPUT(Now select the input window in QMS and press ENTER to continue)
SLEEP(5)
LOOP(list)
MOUSE_POS_SET(260,160)
MOUSE_CLICK(left)
SLEEP(1)
KEYBOARD_WRITE(LSTVAL#0)
KEYBOARD_CLICK(enter)
SLEEP(2)
MOUSE_POS_SET(330,560)
MOUSE_CLICK(left)
SLEEP(2)
END_LOOP()
MOUSE_POS_SET(10,10)
